DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research determine difference outcomes patient receive regional anesthesia ( fascia iliaca block ) versus placebo prior undergoing hip arthroscopy labral repair and/or debridement osteoplasty hip impingement .
DOC.detailed_description: Methods : After inform consent obtain routine/pre-surgical clinic visit , patient meet eligibility criterion undergo randomization one two group . These group 1 ) receive regional anesthesia ( single shot fascia iliaca block use bupivacaine ) prior hip arthroscopy , 2 ) undergo subcutaneous injection procedure use normal saline placebo ( 0.9 % sodium chloride water ) instead bupivacaine . Intra-operatively , group receive general anesthesia local anesthesia ( lidocaine bupivacaine peripheral compartment ) .
